entry.title: Uvalde Hallway Video Released
entry.content:
Post 195932 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: Sorry, but Metafilter really isn't for this sort of news story or graphic content. Not trying to be a minor news amalgamation site here, but a place where we sift through stories about the stories (analysis, etc.) and post the best ones -- taz
entry.summary: Post 195932 deleted: This post was deleted for the following reason: Sorry, but Metafilter really isn't for this sort of news story or graphic content. Not trying to be a minor news amalgamation site here, but a place where we sift through stories about the stories (analysis, etc.) and post the best ones -- taz
